ResourceHeader.ResourceName: ISEE-3 Linearly Interpolated 60 s Resolution Solar Wind Plasma data in GSE Coordinates

RevisionEvent.Note: Updated to SPASE Version 2.3.2 if needed, Applied quality control for DOI usage, LFB

Added ObservedRegion(s). Changed http to https in top-level schemaLocation attribute. Fixed version number separator in top-level schemaLocation attribute. Matched version number in schemaLocation attribute to value in Version tag. ZCB
Added MetadataRightsList. Added ResourceType and NamingAuthority. Updated to 2.7.1. ZCB

ResourceHeader.Description: ISEE-3 linearly interpolated to have the measurements on the minute at 60 s resolution solar wind plasma data in GSE coordinates. This data set consists of processed solar wind data that has been linearly interpolated to 1 min resolution at the position of the spacecraft using the interp1.m function in MATLAB. This data set was originally constructed by Dr. J.M. Weygand for Prof. R.L. McPherron, who was the principle investigator of two National Science Foundation studies: GEM Grant ATM 02-1798 and a Space Weather Grant ATM 02-08501. These data were primarily used in superposed epoch studies and cross correlation studies on solar wind.

PublicationInfo.Authors: Weygand, James M.; & McPherron, Robert L.

InformationURL.Name: ISEE-3 Solar Wind Plasma
InformationURL.Description: Solar wind plasma, 2D and 3D Proton and Electron Distribution Functions 2D and 3D Distribution Functions p: 150eV - 7keV; e: 10eV-1keV

InformationURL.Name: Solar Wind Propagation Information
InformationURL.Description: Solar wind archive at UCLA. This archive provides a list of available data resources and available time ranges.

AccessURL.Name: IGPP UCLA ISEE 3 Plasma Data JMW Processed Archive

TimeSpan.Note: Time format in data files is: Day Month Year Hour Minute Second (DD MM YYYY HH MM SS.SSS)

Parameter.Name: Universal Time
Parameter.Description: Interpolated universal time columns from left to right are: day month year hour minute sec in the format of dd mm yyyy hh mm ss.

Structure.Description: Universal Time expressed using a 6-column day, month, year, hour, minute, second representation

Parameter.Name: ISEE-3 Solar Wind Plasma Density Interpolated to 1 min Resolution in GSE Coordinates
Parameter.Description: Density for ISEE-3 Solar Wind Plasma in units of number per cubic centimeter in GSE coordinates.

Parameter.Name: ISEE-3 Solar Wind Plasma Thermal Speed Interpolated to 1 min Resolution in GSE Coordinates
Parameter.Description: ISEE-3 Solar Wind Plasma thermal speed in units of km/s in GSE coordinates.
Parameter.Caveats: Be sure you understand the instrument

Parameter.Name: ISEE-3 Solar Wind Plasma Velocity Vector Interpolated to 1 min Resolution in GSE Coordinates
Parameter.Description: Flow vector for ISEE-3 Solar Wind Plasma in GSE coordinates in units of km/s.
Parameter.Caveats: Be sure you understand the instrument

Parameter.Name: ISEE-3 Spacecraft Position Vector Interpolated to 1 min Resolution in GSE Coordinates
Parameter.Description: Location of the spacecraft in GSE coordinates in units of Re
